summary: Implemented /learn command, skill-learn, and learn-agent for tag extraction and task creation. Created command with dry-run support, thin-wrapper skill with postflight handling, and full agent with 7-stage execution. Updated documentation in README.md and CLAUDE.md.

artifacts.summary: Command definition with argument parsing and tag types documentation
Thin wrapper skill with delegation and postflight handling
Full agent implementation with tag extraction and task generation
End-to-end example showing dry-run and execute modes

next_steps: Review implementation and run /learn --dry-run to test tag extraction
